works.description:
We've noticed a site on Blogspot has copy
 
and pasted our content. Permission was neither asked nor granted to  
reproduce our Work and this blog therefore constitutes infringement of our
 
rights. In terms of the Copyright Statutes, we are entitled to an  
injunction against the continued infringement, as well as to recover  
damages from them for the loss we have suffered as a result of the  
infringing conduct.

In the circumstances, we demand that you immediately:

1. remove all infringing content and notify us in writing that you have  
done so;
2. immediately cease the use and distribution of copyrighted material;
3. undertake in writing to desist from using any of our copyrighted Work
in  
future without prior written authority from us.
